item.title: Highlights from John Cena's farewell tour
item.description: Here are the best moments from John Cena's "The Last Time is Now" farewell tour, which kicked off at Intuit Dome on Jan. 6.

item.title: Bobby Marks' NBA Contract Year All-Stars: Reaves, Lakers lead 12-man lineup
item.description: Austin Reaves is headed for a massive raise in the offseason. He's not alone.

item.title: NFL Week 10's top performance? Check the results of this week's 'Himmy' Award
item.description: TreVeyon Henderson, Matthew Stafford, DeMarcus Lawrence or Jonathan Taylor -- who earned Week 10's "Himmy" Award?

item.title: Jets' petty post aimed at state of Ohio leads trolls
item.description: Week 10 of the NFL season brought its fair share of trolls once again, led by the New York Jets.

item.title: MLB Awards Week predictions, results: Kurtz, Baldwin named Rookies of the Year
item.description: Baseball's best players and managers of 2025 are collecting their hardware, starting with a pair of rookies from the A's and Braves.
